name: Blobby (Storm)
description:
Blobby is a new take on the phrase "Bouncy Platformer." Join Blobby, a sticky blob of phosphorescent goo, as he explores the only place he's ever known. Bounce on walls, travel through tubes, and discover the secret behind your entire journey.

Leftclick to launch yourself

Right click to stick to surfaces

(Tap Right-click in the air, you will then stick to the next surface you come in contact with)
